t: How does selling t-shirts on Amazon Merch differ from other pod sites like Redbubble and Threadless? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): On Amazon Merch if you don’t sell the designs by a certain amount, those designs will be taken down, and you have the opportunity to upload a different designs to fill up your tier quota. You also have to go through a tier system, and you can only go up, if you satisfy their ...
